Check company reviews for cultural fit assessment
Look for 'Easy Apply' options for quick submission
Save job URLs and Indeed job IDs
optimization_tips: Create Indeed profile for personalized recommendations
Set up job alerts for specific search criteria
Use company pages to research culture and benefits
Apply quickly to new postings for better visibility
